song.title: The Stand
song.lyrics:
[V1] You stood before creation Eternity within Your hands You spoke all life into motion My soul now to stand
[V2] You stood before my failure And carried the cross for my shame My sin weighed upon Your shoulders My soul now to stand
[P] So what can I say And what could I do But offer this heart O God Completely to You
[V3] So I'll walk upon salvation Your Spirit alive in me This life to declare Your promise My soul now to stand
[C] So I'll stand With arms high and heart abandoned In awe of the One who gave it all I'll stand My soul Lord to You surrendered All I am is Yours
